author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Pokemon Legends: Z-A is out now. We're enjoying it considerably so far, and it's got its own interesting story of a group of young adults learning to love and protect their city and all the people and Pokemon in it. But there's one moment in Z-A that's got us thinking about another story entirely, one contained in Pokemon Legends: Arceus.
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Finally Resolves One of Pokémon Legends: Arceus' Saddest Stories

description: On October 16, Tomonobu Itagaki’s Facebook account revealed that the video game developer had passed away at age 58. Tributes to the Dead or Alive creator have been pouring in from fans and fellow game developers alike, especially in his home country of Japan.

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Since the very first games, Pokémon Centers have been staffed by a roster of completely identical women (skin, hair, eyes, expression, everything!), all known in the anime as Nurse Joy. But in Pokémon Legends: Z-A, for the first time, working Nurse Joys can be a little different.
title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Finally Introduces Unique Nurse Joys to Pokémon Centers

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Back to the Future's iconic Marty McFly guitar scene contains a number of timeline conundrums fans have noted many times over the years. But chief among them is a mistake that revolves around the iconic guitar McFly plays during his performance of Earth Angel and Johnny B. Goode.
title: 'For Me, It Makes Little Difference Which I Played' — Michael J. Fox Addresses 'Temporal Inconsistency' In Iconic Back to the Future Guitar Scene, 40 Years Later

description: South Park has abruptly brought Season 27 to an end after just five episodes, and kicked off Season 28 with a new episode, dubbed Twisted Christian.
